body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for reaching out to Collins Automotive. My name is Vincent Collins. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Jane. Could you please spell out your birth year for security purposes?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Jane. Can you provide the last four digits of your mobile number?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great! We appreciate your verification. Is there anything else I can assist you with today, Jane?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, I'm just feeling a bit sad about the situation.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I understand, Jane. Thank you for sharing. We value your feedback. Is there anything specific you'd like us to address?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Not at the moment, thank you.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for taking the time to chat with us, Jane. Please feel free to reach out if you have any future concerns. Have a wonderful day.
